dataMapping.title: Creative Rollout Timeline
dataMapping.subtitle: Creative asset development, testing, and deployment schedule
dataMapping.overallObjective: Primary creative objective (e.g., 'Deploy optimized creative variations with 20% engagement lift')

phases.primaryLabel: Creative phase (e.g., 'Asset Generation', 'A/B Testing Phase', 'Performance Optimization')
phases.expectedOutcome: Expected creative outcomes and performance metrics

milestones.milestoneLabel: Creative milestone (e.g., 'Assets Generated', 'A/B Test Results Available')

dependencies: Creative dependencies (e.g., 'Brand guidelines approved', 'Target audience defined')

successMetrics: Creative success metrics (e.g., '20% engagement lift', '3.5% CTR target', 'Brand recall increase')
riskFactors: Creative risks (e.g., 'Creative fatigue', 'Brand compliance issues', 'Production delays')
